title: Random lag spike and FPS drops
body: It started on Monday at night while I was doing an ARAM, my ping suddenly went from a stable 31-33 ping to a VERY unstable 40-90 ping with my FPS randomly dropping from 140-ish to 70-80 every once in a while. I haven't played since Monday and tried playing a game before going to work today and the same thing happened.

replies.body:
BOYS! i know how to fix this fps issues ( IM SO HAPPY )
it can take 1hour to fix him.
first step: update java to java 121
and finaly in the launcher,
u need to click to the case ( the ''?"" ) and click the scanning files.
And then enjoy.

Sudden and erratic spikes in ping like this can be caused by a bad connection to the game server, and it specifically sounds like you're experiencing packet loss.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these games to really know for sure.  Let me know what you find.

I'm at work right now but as soon as I get home I'll try to run the reader and see the results. What I don't understand though is why my ping is staying between 40 and 90 when my usual ping is 31-33. If it were between 31-90 I could understand but that's not the case since even at its lowest my ping is still above its usual values.
